title: Mencuri Raden Saleh
review: A group plans to steal a priceless historical painting 'The Arrest of Prince Diponegoro' by Raden Saleh from the Presidential Palace.

title: Noktah Merah Perkawinan
review: The relationship between Ambar and Gilang begins to enter a period of disappointment after a big fight due to the interference of both parents in their domestic affair.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
review: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

title: Pinocchio
review: A puppet is brought to life by a fairy, who assigns him to lead a virtuous life in order to become a real boy.

title: Nope
review: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

title: Me Time
review: Follows a dad who finds time for himself for the first time in years while his wife and kids are away. He reconnects with a friend for a wild weekend.

title: The Invitation
review: A young woman is courted and swept off her feet, only to realize a gothic conspiracy is afoot.

title: Beast
review: A father and his two teenage daughters find themselves hunted by a massive rogue lion intent on proving that the Savanna has but one apex predator.

title: Orphan: First Kill
review: After orchestrating a brilliant escape from an Estonian psychiatric facility, Esther travels to America by impersonating the missing daughter of a wealthy family.

title: Fall
review: Best friends Becky and Hunter find themselves at the top of a 2,000-foot radio tower.
